SEARCH
Package ScreenForms

Class InputOutputWindow

java.lang.Object
ScreenForms.InputOutputWindow
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddElementWindow, AddReportWindow, DeleteElementWindow, EditElementWindow
public abstract class InputOutputWindow extends Object
Base class for all input and output windows in the application Provides common functionality for dialogs that get user input and show messages to the user

  • Constructor Details

    • InputOutputWindow

      public InputOutputWindow(String text, String title_window, int num_Fields, int _numRadioButtons)
      Creates a new window for input and output
      Parameters:
      text - the instruction text to show to user
      title_window - the title of the window
      num_Fields - how many input fields to create
      _numRadioButtons - how many radio buttons to create

    • InputOutputWindow

      public InputOutputWindow()

  • Method Details

    • show

      public abstract void show() throws InputException
      Makes the application window visible
      Throws:
      InputException - if there's an error displaying the window

    • getData

      public String[] getData()
      Gets the data that user entered in the text fields
      Returns:
      array of strings with user input, or null if user cancelled

    • successOperationWindow

      public void successOperationWindow(String text)
      Shows a window with success message
      Parameters:
      text - the success message to show

    • confirmOperationWindow

      public boolean confirmOperationWindow(String text)
      Shows a window to confirm an action with user
      Parameters:
      text - the question to ask user
      Returns:
      true if user clicked Yes, false if user clicked No

    • showErrorDialog

      public void showErrorDialog(String errorMessage)
      Shows an error message dialog
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - the error message to display
